metadata.title: Component definition for AI ICT Guardrails

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID redirect URIs are not using localhost or 127.0.0.1

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID redirect URIs are not using wildcards (*)

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID user profile updates from client apps is disabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory users aren't able to update their own accounts

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory users aren't able to self-sign up to applications

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory lockout policy after failed # of sign-in attempts is enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory advanced password management is enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory avoid password reuse policy is enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory lockout period is set to at least # minute(s)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Lockout duration policy setting in minutes

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID anonymous authentication is disabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID runtime activity capture is enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID webhooks are using HTTPS only

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID email dispatchers are using HTTPS only

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID redirect URIs are using HTTPS only

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID social identity providers are disabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID multifactor authentication (MFA) is enabled for Cloud Directory users

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID email verification is enabled for Cloud Directory users

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID password strength regex is configured

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID advanced password policies are enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory prevent username in password policy is enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory minimum period between password changes policy is set to greater than 0

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Mininum number of hours between App ID password changes

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID Cloud Directory password expiration policy is enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID access tokens are configured to expire within # minutes

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Expiration in minutes of App ID access tokens

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App ID is enabled with customer-managed encryption and Keep Your Own Key (KYOK)

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure App Configuration can be accessed only through a private endpoint

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure there are no wild cards in the private endpoint allow list for App Configuration

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Activity Tracker Event Routing is configured to collect global events generated by IBM Cloud services

props.value: Ensure there is an Activity Tracker event route defined in each region to collect location-based events

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Cloud Object Storage quota enforcement is off for buckets that are configured to use Activity Tracker Event Routing

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure any Cloud Object Storage buckets used by Activity Tracker Event Routing have resiliency set to cross region

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Financial Services Validated setting is enabled in account settings

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure user list visibility restrictions are configured in IAM settings for the account owner

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Cloud Object Storage can be accessed only through a private endpoint

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Cloud Object Storage network access is restricted to a specific IP range

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure there are no wild cards in the private endpoint allow list for Cloud Object Storage

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Cloud Object Storage buckets with a quota have threshold-based alerts enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Cloud Object Storage is accessible only through TLS 1.2 or higher

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Cloud Object Storage bucket resiliency is set to cross region

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Cloud Object Storage is enabled with customer-managed encryption and Keep Your Own Key (KYOK)

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Code Engine can be accessed only through a private endpoint

props.value: Ensure there are no wild cards in the private endpoint allow list for Code Engine

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Container Registry image pushes and pulls take place only over private endpoints

props.value: Ensure there are no wild cards in the private endpoint allow list for Container Registry

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Container Registry Vulnerability Advisor scans for critical or high vulnerabilities in the system at least every # day(s)

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Maximum number of days between vulnerability scans

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Red Hat OpenShift on IBM Cloud is accessible only by using private endpoints

props.value: Ensure Kubernetes Service can be accessed only through a private endpoint

props.value: Ensure there are no wild cards in the private endpoint allow list for Kubernetes Service

props.value: Ensure OpenShift worker nodes are updated to the latest image to ensure patching of vulnerabilities

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Hyper Protect Crypto Services has failover units in at least 2 different regions

props.name: Parameter_Value_Alternatives
props.value: au-syd, br-sao, ca-tor, eu-de, eu-gb, jp-osa, jp-tok, us-east, us-south

props.name: Parameter_Constraint
props.value: any combination of geo zones values

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Hyper Protect Crypto Services has failover units in at least 2 different regions that are Financial Services Validated

props.name: Parameter_Value_Alternatives
props.value: au-syd, br-sao, ca-tor, eu-de, eu-gb, jp-osa, jp-tok, us-east, us-south

props.name: Parameter_Constraint
props.value: any combination of geo zones values

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Hyper Protect Crypto Services instance has at least # crypto units

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Number of IBM Cloud Hyper Protect Crypto Service units

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Hyper Protect Crypto Services encryption keys that are generated by the service are rotated automatically at least every # months

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Hyper Protect Crypto Services key rotation policy

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Hyper Protect Crypto Services instance is enabled with a dual authorization deletion policy

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IAM access management can be accessed only through a private endpoint

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure there are no wild cards in the private endpoint allow list for IAM access management

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure Cloud Object Storage public access is disabled in IAM settings (not applicable to ACLs managed using S3 APIs)

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IAM access groups can be accessed only through a private endpoint

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure there are no wild cards in the private endpoint allow list for IAM access groups

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure no public access is granted via the IAM public access group

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure provisioned services are IAM enabled

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud accounts are one of the account types used to support your applications

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IAM roles are used to create IAM policies for IBM resources

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure permissions for API key creation are limited and configured in IAM settings for the account owner

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure permissions for service ID creation are limited and configured in IAM settings for the account owner

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IAM identities can be accessed only through a private endpoint

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure there are no wild cards in the private endpoint allow list for IAM identities

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid enforces a limit of 5 consecutive unsuccessful sign in attempts

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid automatically locks an account for 30 minutes after 5 consecutive unsuccessful sign in attempts

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure sign out due to inactivity is set to # seconds or less for IBM Cloud accounts

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Sign out due to inactivity in seconds

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud retains the session lock until access is reestablished by signing in

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud console conceals information previously visible on the display when the user has been signed out due to inactivity

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud provides the means to associate a customer-defined security identifier and attributes with IBM Cloud resources (for example, tags)

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud provides the ability to immediately terminate a user session for an account

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid uniquely identifies and authenticates organizational users or processes that act on behalf of organizational users

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud IAM uniquely identifies and authenticates organizational users or processes that act on behalf of organizational users

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure multifactor authentication (MFA) is enabled at the account level

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure authorized IP ranges are configured for the account

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid selects and assigns identifiers that identify individuals

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud assigns identifiers that identify individuals, groups, roles, and devices

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud prevents reuse of identifiers

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud IAM establishes initial authenticator content for authenticators that are defined by the organization (for example, API keys)

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid ensures that passwords have sufficient strength for their intended use

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud IAM ensures that authenticators, such as API keys, have sufficient strength for their intended use

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid establishes minimum and maximum lifetime restrictions and reuse conditions for authenticators

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBM Cloud IAM establishes minimum and maximum lifetime restrictions and reuse conditions for authenticators, such as API keys

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid password policy requires at least one uppercase letter

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid password policy requires at least one lowercase letter

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid password policy requires at least one number

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid password policy requires minimum length of 12 characters

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid password may contain only printable ASCII characters (in the range 33 - 126)

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid password policy contains spaces or any  special characters

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid uses a password meter that coaches users to create strong passwords that exceed the minimum requirements

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid stores and transmits only encrypted representations of passwords

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid enforces password expiry after 90 days

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid does not allow changed or reset passwords to be the same as any of the 24 previously used passwords

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid employs automated tools to determine if password authenticators satisfy IBMid password requirements

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure IBMid protects user information during the authentication process from possible exploitation by unauthorized individuals by obscuring it

props.name: Rule_Description
props.value: Ensure sign out for active sessions is set to # seconds or less for IBM Cloud accounts

props.name: Parameter_Description
props.value: Session expiration in seconds for the account
